function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of integration of data sources of existing digital transformation technologies","Impact":"Inefficient use of data and suboptimal decision-making in healthcare","Mitigation":"Developing a comprehensive data integration strategy and infrastructure","Technologies":"Data integration platforms and interoperability standards","People":"Healthcare providers, tech developers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Proliferation of digital transformation technologies without holistic management","Impact":"Fragmented and uncoordinated use of technologies, leading to inefficiencies and missed opportunities","Mitigation":"Establishing a comprehensive digital transformation governance framework","Technologies":"Enterprise architecture and digital transformation management platforms","People":"Healthcare decision-makers, IT professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations"}]}
